## Create



Create a Content Expansion

<MimeTabs><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Request Body</strong><strong style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","color":"var(--openapi-required)"}}> required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"url"} required={true} schemaName={"url"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The target URL.","format":"url"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"entities"} required={true} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"uniqueItems":true,"type":"array","description":"A list of entity labels.","items":{"type":"string","description":"A list of entity labels."}}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"openai_key"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The OpenAI key."}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

// File: api/analysis/create-entity-gap.api

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";

## Create



Create an Entity Gaps analysis.

<MimeTabs><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Request Body</strong><strong style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","color":"var(--openapi-required)"}}> required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"url"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The URL to analyze."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"query"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The search query to analyze."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"model"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The model"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"number_of_entities"} required={false} schemaName={"int32"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"Number of entities to highlight.","format":"int32","default":5}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"query_location_name"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The location name for the query, e.g. United Kingdom.","example":"United Kingdom","default":"United States"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"query_search_engine"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The search engine domain for the query, if not set will be chosen according to `query_location_name`","example":"google.co.uk","default":"google.com"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Found.

</div><div><MimeTabs schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} [</div></li><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"text"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The text matching the entity."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"confidence"} required={false} schemaName={"double"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `<= 1`"} schema={{"maximum":1,"minimum":0,"type":"number","description":"The confidence score this is the right entity.","format":"double"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"occurrences"} required={false} schemaName={"int32"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"The number of occurrences.","format":"int32"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"serp_position"} required={false} schemaName={"int32"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"The position of the entity in SERP. `null` if not applicable.","format":"int32"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"entity_id"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The entity id (URI)."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"entity_label"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"items\": [\n    {\n      \"text\": \"string\",\n      \"confidence\": 0,\n      \"occurrences\": 0,\n      \"serp_position\": ## Create



Create an analysis request

<MimeTabs><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Request // File: api/analysis/merge.api

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";

## Analyse and Merge



Analyze content and return the results merged as HTML code.

<MimeTabs><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Request Body</strong><strong style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","color":"var(--openapi-required)"}}> required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}}><summary style={{}}><strong>html</strong><span style={{"opacity":"0.6"}}> object</span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

The html fragment or html page to analyze.

</div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"fragment"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The html fragment to analyze."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"page"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The html page to analyze, either fragment or page should be present"}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"url"} required={false} schemaName={"url"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The url of the page to analyze.","format":"url"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"urlClient"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`CHROME`, `PLAIN_HTTP`, `CHROME, PLAIN_HTTP`]"} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The client which the analysis should use to extract the content, by default chrome is used.","enum":["CHROME","PLAIN_HTTP","CHROME, PLAIN_HTTP"]}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"language"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `>= 2 characters` and `<= 2 characters`"} schema={{"maxLength":2,"minLength":2,"type":"string","description":"The content language, 2 letters code, e.g. 'en'."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"text"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"A textual fragment."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"exclude"} required={false} schemaName={"url[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","description":"An array of item IDs to exclude from the analysis results.","items":{"type":"string","description":"An array of item IDs to exclude from the analysis results.","format":"url"}}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"scope"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The scope of the analysis, one of 'local', 'network', 'cloud-only', 'network-only' or 'all'."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"matches"} required={false} schemaName={"int32"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"Filter out results that don't have at least the specified number of occurrences. By default 1.","format":"int32"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"links"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"When returning an interpolated HTML results, matches should have the 'wl-link' class. By default 'no'."}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Success

</div><div><MimeTabs schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"text/html"} value={"text/html"}><SchemaTabs><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem","marginLeft":"1rem"}}>

string

</div></ul></details></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"401"} value={"401"}><div>

Authentication Failure

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"500"} value={"500"}><div>

Server Error

</div><div></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div>

// File: api/analysis/v-2-analysis.api

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";

## Analyse Web Page



Analyse the content of a webpage by using the `url` property of the request.

<MimeTabs><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Request Body</strong><strong style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","color":"var(--openapi-required)"}}> required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}}><summary style={{}}><strong>html</strong><span style={{"opacity":"0.6"}}> object</span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

The html fragment or html page to analyze.

</div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"fragment"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The html fragment to analyze."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"page"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The html page to analyze, either fragment or page should be present"}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"url"} required={false} schemaName={"url"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The url of the page to analyze.","format":"url"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"urlClient"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`CHROME`, `PLAIN_HTTP`, `CHROME, PLAIN_HTTP`]"} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The client which the analysis should use to extract the content, by default chrome is used.","enum":["CHROME","PLAIN_HTTP","CHROME, PLAIN_HTTP"]}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"language"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `>= 2 characters` and `<= 2 characters`"} schema={{"maxLength":2,"minLength":2,"type":"string","description":"The content language, 2 letters code, e.g. 'en'."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"text"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"A textual fragment."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"exclude"} required={false} schemaName={"url[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","description":"An array of item IDs to exclude from the analysis results.","items":{"type":"string","description":"An array of item IDs to exclude from the analysis results.","format":"url"}}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"scope"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The scope of the analysis, one of 'local', 'network', 'cloud-only', 'network-only' or 'all'."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"matches"} required={false} schemaName={"int32"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"Filter out results that don't have at least the specified number of occurrences. By default 1.","format":"int32"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"links"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"When returning an interpolated HTML results, matches should have the 'wl-link' class. By default 'no'."}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Success

</div><div><MimeTabs schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}}><summary style={{}}><strong>entities</strong><span style={{"opacity":"0.6"}}> object</span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

// File: api/audit/wordlift-audit-api.info

import ApiLogo from "@theme/ApiLogo";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Export from "@theme/ApiDemoPanel/Export";

<span className={"theme-doc-version-badge badge badge--secondary"}>Version: 1.0.0</span>

# WordLift Audit API



The WordLift Audit API provides comprehensive SEO and AI-readiness analysis for websites.
It evaluates site files, SEO fundamentals, structured data, content structure, image accessibility,
automation readiness, and JavaScript rendering to provide actionable insights for improving
both search engine and AI agent discoverability.


<div style={{"marginBottom":"2rem"}}><h2 id={"authentication"} style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}}>Authentication</h2><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__security-schemes"}><TabItem label={"API Key: ApiKey"} value={"ApiKey"}>

API Key authentication. Use the format: `Key [your-wordlift-key]`

Example: `Authorization: Key wl_abc123def456`


<div><table><tbody><tr><th>Security Scheme Type:</th><td>apiKey</td></tr><tr><th>Header parameter name:</th><td>Authorization</td></tr></tbody></table></div></TabItem></SchemaTabs></div>

---

// File: api/audit/audit-website.api

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

## Website Audit



Performs a comprehensive SEO and AI-readiness audit of a specified URL. The audit analyzes:
- Site files (robots.txt, llms.txt)
- SEO fundamentals (title, description, headings)
- Structured data (Schema.org, JSON-LD)
- Content structure and semantic HTML
- Image accessibility
- Automation readiness for AI agents
- JavaScript rendering and bot accessibility

Returns an overall score (0-100) and detailed recommendations for improvement.


<MimeTabs><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Request Body</strong><strong style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","color":"var(--openapi-required)"}}> required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"url"} required={true} schemaName={"uri"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","format":"uri","title":"URL","description":"The full URL of the website to audit","example":"https://example.com"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

// File: api/content-evaluations/wordlift-content-evaluations-api.info

import ApiLogo from "@theme/ApiLogo";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Export from "@theme/ApiDemoPanel/Export";

<span className={"theme-doc-version-badge badge badge--secondary"}>Version: 1.0.0</span>

# WordLift Content Evaluations API

API for evaluating text content based on specific criteria.

<div style={{"marginBottom":"2rem"}}><h2 id={"authentication"} style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}}>Authentication</h2><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__security-schemes"}><TabItem label={"API Key: ApiKeyAuth"} value={"ApiKeyAuth"}><div><table><tbody><tr><th>Security Scheme Type:</th><td>apiKey</td></tr><tr><th>Header parameter name:</th><td>Authorization</td></tr></tbody></table></div></TabItem></SchemaTabs></div>

## Overview

This API allows you to submit text content and receive an evaluation based on predefined metrics or models. It provides scores for content quality, readability, and SEO aspects.

## Basic Usage

```bash
curl --request POST \
  --url https://api.wordlift.io/content-evaluations \
  --header 'Authorization: Key YOUR_API_KEY' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --data '{
    "text": "Your text content goes here...",
    "keywords": ["keyword1", "keyword2"]
}'
```

The API evaluates your content and returns detailed quality metrics including:
- Overall quality score
- Content assessment (purpose, accuracy, depth)
- Readability metrics
- SEO analysis with keyword density and entity recognition

---

// File: api/content-generation/content-generation.info

import ApiLogo from "@theme/ApiLogo";

# Content Generation



Generate completions based on customized linguistic models.

<div style={{"marginBottom":"2rem"}}><h2 id={"authentication"} style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}}>Authentication</h2><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__security-schemes"}><TabItem label={"OAuth 2.0: security_oauth2"} value={"security_oauth2"}><div><table><tbody><tr><th>Security Scheme Type:</th><td>oauth2</td></tr><tr><th>OAuth Flow (authorizationCode):</th><td><p>Token URL: https://s.wordlift.io/oauth/token/</p><p>Authorization URL: https://s.wordlift.io/oauth/authorize/</p><span>Scopes:</span><ul><li>basic: basic scope</li></ul></td></tr></tbody></table></div></TabItem></SchemaTabs></div><div style={{"display":"flex","flexDirection":"column","marginBottom":"var(--ifm-paragraph-margin-bottom)"}}><h3 style={{"marginBottom":"0.25rem"}}>Contact</h3><span>WordLift: <a href={"mailto:hello@wordlift.io"}>hello@wordlift.io</a></span><span>URL: <a href={"https://wordlift.io"}>https://wordlift.io</a></span></div><div style={{"marginBottom":"var(--ifm-paragraph-margin-bottom)"}}><h3 style={{"marginBottom":"0.25rem"}}>Terms of Service</h3><a href={"https://wordlift.io/terms-of-service/"}>https://wordlift.io/terms-of-service/</a></div><div style={{"marginBottom":"var(--ifm-paragraph-margin-bottom)"}}><h3 style={{"marginBottom":"0.25rem"}}>License</h3><a href={"https://wordlift.io"}>(c) copyright 2022-present WordLift</a></div>

// File: api/content-generation/create-rule.api

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";

## create Rule



create Rule

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><strong>Path Parameters</strong></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"The Content Generation id.","in":"path","name":"contentGenerationId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><MimeTabs><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Request Body</strong><strong style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","color":"var(--openapi-required)"}}> required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}}><summary style={{}}><strong>fixes</strong><span style={{"opacity":"0.6"}}> object[]</span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

The list of fixes to apply when the rule validation fails.

## Update words from csv file



Send a list of word biases for this prompt. Existing words they will be deleted.

</div></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"201"} value={"201"}><div>

## Render



[GET with body payload](https://opensource.zalando.com/restful-api-guidelines/#get-with-body) - no resources created

<MimeTabs><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Request Body</strong><span style={{"opacity":"0.6"}}> array</span><strong style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","color":"var(--openapi-required)"}}> required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem","paddingBottom":".5rem"}}>Array [</div></li><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"template"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The liquid template."}}></SchemaItem><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem"}}>]</div></li></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Found.

## Update



Update

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><strong>Query Parameters</strong></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"The project id","in":"query","name":"project_id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"The project type","in":"query","name":"project_type","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","description":"The project type, if applicable.","enum":["SMART_CONTENT","CONTENT_GENERATION"],"title":"ProjectType"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><MimeTabs><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Request Body</strong><span style={{"opacity":"0.6"}}> array</span><strong style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","color":"var(--openapi-required)"}}> required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem","paddingBottom":".5rem"}}>Array [</div></li><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"description"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Description for the rule"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}}><summary style={{}}><strong>fixes</strong><span style={{"opacity":"0.6"}}> object[]</span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

// File: api/events/events.info

import ApiLogo from "@theme/ApiLogo";

# Events



An API to record and query events raised by clients in order to facilitate KPI tracking.

<div style={{"marginBottom":"2rem"}}><h2 id={"authentication"} style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}}>Authentication</h2><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__security-schemes"}><TabItem label={"API Key: ApiKey"} value={"ApiKey"}>

`Key {your key}`

// File: api/events/create-event.api

## List



List the events bound to the authenticated account.

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><strong>Query Parameters</strong></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"url","in":"query","description":"URLs to return","required":false,"schema":{"uniqueItems":true,"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"date_greater_than","in":"query","description":"Event datetime filter to return events with date greater than the parameter","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"date_less_than","in":"query","description":"Event datetime filter to return events with date less than the parameter","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"cursor","in":"query","description":"The pagination cursor","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"limit","in":"query","description":"The maximum number of results","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

// File: api/fact-check/wordlift-fact-checking-api.info

import ApiLogo from "@theme/ApiLogo";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Export from "@theme/ApiDemoPanel/Export";

<span className={"theme-doc-version-badge badge badge--secondary"}>Version: 1.0.0</span>

# WordLift Fact-Checking API



API for semi-automated fact-checking. Returns schema.org/ClaimReview markup. This markup is structured data that contains information about the fact check -- for example, what was the claim being assessed, who made the claim, what was the verdict.

<div style={{"marginBottom":"2rem"}}><h2 id={"authentication"} style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}}>Authentication</h2><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__security-schemes"}><TabItem label={"API Key: ApiKeyAuth"} value={"ApiKeyAuth"}><div><table><tbody><tr><th>Security Scheme Type:</th><td>apiKey</td></tr><tr><th>Header parameter name:</th><td>Authorization</td></tr></tbody></table></div></TabItem></SchemaTabs></div>

---

## Submit a fact-checking request



Submit a fact-checking request

<MimeTabs><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Request Body</strong><strong style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","color":"var(--openapi-required)"}}> required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"query"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"Aristotele said 'It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.'"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Fact-checking result

</div><div><MimeTabs schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"response"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"{\n  \"@context\": \"http://schema.org\",\n  \"@type\": \"ClaimReview\",\n  \"claimReviewed\": \"Aristotle quote 'It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.'\",\n  \"author\": { \"@type\": \"Organization\", \"name\": \"WordLift\" },\n  \"datePublished\": \"2024-01-17\",\n  \"reviewRating\": {\n    \"@type\": \"Rating\",\n    \"ratingValue\": \"5\",\n    \"alternateName\": \"True\",\n    \"bestRating\": \"5\",\n    \"worstRating\": \"1\"\n  },\n  \"url\": \"https://fact-check.wordlift.io/review/aristotle-quote\",\n  \"reviewBody\": \"The quote 'It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.' is correctly attributable to Aristotle. It has been found in multiple credible sources, including publications of academic texts, reputable quote repositories, and philosophical discussions.\",\n  \"itemReviewed\": {\n    \"@type\": \"CreativeWork\",\n    \"url\": [\"https://www.azquotes.com/quote/10261\", \"https://philosiblog.com/2012/03/07/it-is-the-mark-of-an-educated-mind-to-be-able-to-entertain-a-thought-without-accepting-it/\", \"https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/aristotle_100584\", \"https://www.goodreads.com/quotes/1629-it-is-the-mark-of-an-educated-mind-to-be\", \"https://www.socratic-method.com/philosophy-quote-meanings/aristotle-it-is-the-mark-of-an-educated-mind-to-be-able-to-entertain-a-thought-without-accepting-it\"]\n  }\n}"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"response\": \"{\\n  \\\"@context\\\": \\\"http://schema.org\\\",\\n  \\\"@type\\\": \\\"ClaimReview\\\",\\n  \\\"claimReviewed\\\": \\\"Aristotle quote 'It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.'\\\",\\n  \\\"author\\\": { \\\"@type\\\": \\\"Organization\\\", \\\"name\\\": \\\"WordLift\\\" },\\n  \\\"datePublished\\\": \\\"2024-01-17\\\",\\n  \\\"reviewRating\\\": {\\n    \\\"@type\\\": \\\"Rating\\\",\\n    \\\"ratingValue\\\": \\\"5\\\",\\n    \\\"alternateName\\\": \\\"True\\\",\\n    \\\"bestRating\\\": \\\"5\\\",\\n    \\\"worstRating\\\": \\\"1\\\"\\n  },\\n  \\\"url\\\": \\\"https://fact-check.wordlift.io/review/aristotle-quote\\\",\\n  \\\"reviewBody\\\": \\\"The quote 'It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.' is correctly attributable to Aristotle. It has been found in multiple credible sources, including publications of academic texts, reputable quote repositories, and philosophical discussions.\\\",\\n  \\\"itemReviewed\\\": {\\n    \\\"@type\\\": \\\"CreativeWork\\\",\\n    \\\"url\\\": [\\\"https://www.azquotes.com/quote/10261\\\", \\\"https://philosiblog.com/2012/03/07/it-is-the-mark-of-an-educated-mind-to-be-able-to-entertain-a-thought-without-accepting-it/\\\", \\\"https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/aristotle_100584\\\", \\\"https://www.goodreads.com/quotes/1629-it-is-the-mark-of-an-educated-mind-to-be\\\", \\\"https://www.socratic-method.com/philosophy-quote-meanings/aristotle-it-is-the-mark-of-an-educated-mind-to-be-able-to-entertain-a-thought-without-accepting-it\\\"]\\n  }\\n}\"\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div>

// File: api/gsc-url-inspections/post-gsc-url-inspections.api

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";

## Inspect a URL using Google Search Console



Inspect a URL using Google Search Console

<MimeTabs><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Request Body</strong><strong style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","color":"var(--openapi-required)"}}> required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"url"} required={true} schemaName={"uri"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","format":"uri","description":"The URL to inspect"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

URL inspection result from Google Search Console

</div><div><MimeTabs schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} // File: api/image-to-text/image-to-text-api-info

import ApiLogo from "@theme/ApiLogo";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Export from "@theme/ApiDemoPanel/Export";

<span className={"theme-doc-version-badge badge badge--secondary"}>Version: 1.0.0</span>

# WordLift Image-to-Text API

API for converting images into text descriptions. This service allows you to extract textual descriptions from images using AI.

<div style={{"marginBottom":"2rem"}}><h2 id={"authentication"} style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}}>Authentication</h2><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__security-schemes"}><TabItem label={"API Key: ApiKeyAuth"} value={"ApiKeyAuth"}><div><table><tbody><tr><th>Security Scheme Type:</th><td>apiKey</td></tr><tr><th>Header parameter name:</th><td>Authorization</td></tr></tbody></table></div></TabItem></SchemaTabs></div>

## Basic Usage

The Image-to-Text API allows you to convert images into descriptive text. Here's a basic example:

```bash
curl --request POST \
  --url https://api.wordlift.io/image-2-text-v1 \
  --header 'Authorization: Key YOUR_API_KEY' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --data '{
    "image_url": "https://example.com/path/to/image.jpg",
    "prompt_type": "Other",
    "custom_prompt": "Generate concise and descriptive text for the image"
}'

---

## Convert Image to Text

Process an image and generate descriptive text based on its content.

<MimeTabs><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Request Body</strong><strong style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","color":"var(--openapi-required)"}}> required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"image_url"} required={true} schemaName={"Image URL"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","title":"Image URL","description":"URL of the image to be processed"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"prompt_type"} required={true} schemaName={"Prompt Type"} qualifierMessage={"possible values: Other, Product, Scene"} schema={{"type":"string","title":"Prompt Type","description":"Type of analysis to perform","enum":["Other","Product","Scene"]}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"custom_prompt"} required={false} schemaName={"Custom Prompt"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","title":"Custom Prompt","description":"Custom instructions for text generation"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

## Inspect



Inspect a URL to perform a variety of tasks defined by the list of applied filters.

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><strong>Query Parameters</strong></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"u","in":"query","description":"The URL to inspect","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"https://wordlift.io"}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"f","in":"query","description":"Filters to be applied on the result, if you want to apply multiple filters they should be separated by comma","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","example":"validator","enum":["validator","content-analysis","mock-language-detection","browser-response","jena-graph","links","browser-response","lingua-language-detection","language-detection","redlink-content-analysis","summarize","text","validator","xmltei","classify"]},"example":"validator,content-analysis"}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"classes","in":"query","description":"A list of categories to be provided for classify filter.","required":false,"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Found.

</div><div><MimeTabs schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"empty"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem name={"property name*"} required={false} schemaName={"object"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"object"}} collapsible={false} discriminator={false}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"empty\": true\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"401"} value={"401"}><div>

## Microdata to JSON-LD



Provided a URL, converts any microdata found on that URL to JSON-LD.

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><strong>Query Parameters</strong></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"u","in":"query","description":"The web page URL","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

# Long Tail



Provide suggestions for long tail opportunities.

<div style={{"marginBottom":"2rem"}}><h2 id={"authentication"} style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}}>Authentication</h2><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__security-schemes"}><TabItem label={"API Key: ApiKey"} value={"ApiKey"}>

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";

## Get entities



Query for long tail opportunities and receive entities.

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><strong>Query Parameters</strong></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"q","in":"query","description":"The Longtail query","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"ln","in":"query","description":"A location name, origin of the search","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"London,England,United Kingdom"}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"lc","in":"query","description":"Language Code","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"en"}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"sd","in":"query","description":"Search Domain","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"google.co.uk, google.com.au, google.de, etc."}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"sc","in":"query","description":"Analysis Scope","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["all","local","network"]}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"d","in":"query","description":"The maximum number of results to analyze","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","default":"10"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Found.

</div><div><MimeTabs schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"*/*"} value={"*/*"}><SchemaTabs><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"summary"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The page summary."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}}><summary style={{}}><strong>entities</strong><span style={{"opacity":"0.6"}}> object[]</span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

The list of entities matching the query.

</div><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem","paddingBottom":".5rem"}}>Array [</div></li><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"reference"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The referenced entity URI"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}}><summary style={{}}><strong>properties</strong><span style={{"opacity":"0.6"}}> object</span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"name"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The name of the entity."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"sameAs"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","description":"A list of sameAs entity URIs.","items":{"type":"string","description":"A list of sameAs entity URIs."}}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem"}}>]</div></li></div></details></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"summary\": \"string\",\n  \"entities\": [\n    {\n      \"reference\": \"string\",\n      \"properties\": {\n        \"name\": \"string\",\n        \"sameAs\": [\n          \"string\"\n        ]\n      }\n    }\n  ]\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"401"} value={"401"}><div>

## Get entities by rank (async)



Query for long tail opportunities and receive entities along with their position in SERP.

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><strong>Query Parameters</strong></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"q","in":"query","description":"The Longtail query","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"ln","in":"query","description":"A location name, origin of the search","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"London,England,United Kingdom"}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"lc","in":"query","description":"Language Code","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"en"}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"sd","in":"query","description":"Search Domain","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"google.co.uk, google.com.au, google.de, etc."}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"sc","in":"query","description":"Analysis Scope","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["all","local","network"]}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"hk","in":"query","description":"Webhook URL","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"d","in":"query","description":"The maximum number of results to analyze","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","default":"10"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Found.

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"401"} value={"401"}><div>

## Get by id



Get a Web Async operation by its id.

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><strong>Path Parameters</strong></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"The Web Async id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

# Manager



Subscription management and related services.

<div style={{"marginBottom":"2rem"}}><h2 id={"authentication"} style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}}>Authentication</h2><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__security-schemes"}><TabItem label={"API Key: ApiKey"} value={"ApiKey"}>

`Key {your key}`

<div><table><tbody><tr><th>Security Scheme Type:</th><td>apiKey</td></tr><tr><th>Header parameter name:</th><td>Authorization</td></tr></tbody></table></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"OAuth 2.0: OAuth2"} value={"OAuth2"}><div><table><tbody><tr><th>Security Scheme Type:</th><td>oauth2</td></tr><tr><th>OAuth Flow (authorizationCode):</th><td><p>Token URL: https://s.wordlift.io/oauth/token/</p><p>Authorization URL: https://s.wordlift.io/oauth/authorize/</p><span>Scopes:</span><ul><li>basic: basic scope</li></ul></td></tr></tbody></table></div></TabItem></SchemaTabs></div><div style={{"display":"flex","flexDirection":"column","marginBottom":"var(--ifm-paragraph-margin-bottom)"}}><h3 style={{"marginBottom":"0.25rem"}}>Contact</h3><span>WordLift: <a href={"mailto:hello@wordlift.io"}>hello@wordlift.io</a></span><span>URL: <a href={"https://wordlift.io"}>https://wordlift.io</a></span></div><div style={{"marginBottom":"var(--ifm-paragraph-margin-bottom)"}}><h3 style={{"marginBottom":"0.25rem"}}>Terms of Service</h3><a href={"https://wordlift.io/terms-of-service/"}>https://wordlift.io/terms-of-service/</a></div><div style={{"marginBottom":"var(--ifm-paragraph-margin-bottom)"}}><h3 style={{"marginBottom":"0.25rem"}}>License</h3><a href={"https://wordlift.io"}>(c) copyright 2022-present WordLift</a></div>

## Get an Access Code



Call this API to have the Platform receive an Authentication Token to access the Analytics data via Google Search Console.

<MimeTabs><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Request Body</strong><strong style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","color":"var(--openapi-required)"}}> required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"code"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The Authorization Code. The API will use the Authorization Code to exchange it with an Access Token."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"google_search_console_resource_id"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The Google Search Console Resource Id as it shows in the Google Search Console, e.g. sc-domain:example.org."}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Found

</div><div><MimeTabs schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"*/*"} value={"*/*"}><SchemaTabs><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"access_token"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The access token"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"expires_in"} required={false} schemaName={"int32"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"The number of seconds for the access token to expire"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"refresh_token"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The refresh token"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"scope"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The scope"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"token_type"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The token type, usually Bearer"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"access_token\": \"string\",\n  \"expires_in\": 0,\n  \"refresh_token\": \"string\",\n  \"scope\": \"string\",\n  \"token_type\": \"string\"\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"401"} value={"401"}><div>

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"404"} value={"404"}><div>

// File: api/manager/create-authorize-uri.api

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";

## Create an Authorization URI



Call this API to get an authorization URI needed to interactively get an authorization token. Then call the `exchangeAuthCode` to exchange it with an authorization token.

<MimeTabs><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Request Body</strong><strong style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","color":"var(--openapi-required)"}}> required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"redirect_uri"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The Redirect URI to where redirect the Client after successful authentication."}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Found

</div><div><MimeTabs schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"*/*"} value={"*/*"}><SchemaTabs><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"authorize_uri"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The Authorization URI. The Client should be redirected to this URI."}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"authorize_uri\": \"string\"\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"401"} value={"401"}><div>

// File: api/manager/create-embedding.api

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

## Create



Create the embedding for the IRIs for the provided query.

<MimeTabs><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Request Body</strong><strong style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","color":"var(--openapi-required)"}}> required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}}><summary style={{}}><strong>embedding</strong><span style={{"opacity":"0.6"}}> object</span><strong style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","color":"var(--openapi-required)"}}> required</strong></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

A request to generate the embeddings.

</div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"model"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","default":"nomic-ai/nomic-embed-text-v1","description":"The model used to generate the embeddings."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"properties"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","description":"The list of properties to use to generate the embeddings.","items":{"type":"string","description":"The list of properties to use to generate the embeddings."},"uniqueItems":true}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"graphql_query"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The GraphQL query used to select entities to create embedding vectors for."}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"201"} value={"201"}><div>

Success

</div><div><MimeTabs schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/x-ndjson"} value={"application/x-ndjson"}><SchemaTabs><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem","paddingBottom":".5rem"}}>Array [</div></li><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"id"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The id/iri of the web page in the Graph."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"model"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem"}}>]</div></li></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"[\n  {\n    \"id\": \"string\",\n    \"model\": \"string\"\n  }\n]"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"401"} value={"401"}><div>

// File: api/manager/create-merchant.api

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";

// File: api/manager/create-query.api

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

## Create



Create

<MimeTabs><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Request Body</strong><strong style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","color":"var(--openapi-required)"}}> required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}}><summary style={{}}><strong>filters</strong><span style={{"opacity":"0.6"}}> object[]</span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

A list of prefilters.

## Delete

## Get the Web Data URI for a Web Page URL.



The service will return a Web Data URI only for existing datasets. The Web Data URI is not guaranteed to exist (i.e. it may return 404).


<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><strong>Query Parameters</strong></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"The Web Page URL.","in":"query","name":"u","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"url"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"303"} value={"303"}><div>

See Other

${api.data-uri-controller.get.headers.location.description}

</div></div></li></ul></details><div></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div>

## List



List the include and exclude configurations.

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><strong>Query Parameters</strong></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"in":"query","name":"account","required":true,"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"analytics_client_factory":{"type":"string"},"analyzerId":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"botify_project":{"type":"string"},"botify_token":{"type":"string"},"botify_username":{"type":"string"},"country":{"type":"string"},"datasetId":{"type":"string","deprecated":true},"datasetUri":{"type":"string"},"domainUri":{"type":"string"},"google_search_console_site_url":{"type":"string"},"id":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"indexed":{"type":"boolean"},"key":{"type":"string"},"language":{"type":"string"},"ngDatasetId":{"type":"string"},"resolvedUrl":{"type":"string"},"subscriptionId":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"url":{"type":"string"},"wpAdmin":{"type":"string"},"wpJson":{"type":"string"},"wp_include_exclude_default":{"type":"string"}},"title":"Account"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

## List



List OAuth2 Authorized Clients

## List



List the Websites

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><strong>Query Parameters</strong></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"The Google access token, must have access to the Google Search Console scope","in":"query","name":"google_access_token","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"The maximum number of results","in":"query","name":"limit","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","default":10}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

</div><div><MimeTabs schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"first"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The link to the first page.","nullable":true}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}}><summary style={{}}><strong>items</strong><span style={{"opacity":"0.6"}}> object[]</span><strong style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","color":"var(--openapi-required)"}}> required</strong></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

An array of objects.

<MimeTabs><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Request Body</strong><strong style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","color":"var(--openapi-required)"}}> required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"site_url"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** Value must match regular expression `^(https?://|sc-domain:)\\S+`"} schema={{"type":"string","pattern":"^(https?://|sc-domain:)\\S+"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

## Get



The autocomplete endpoint suggests entities from Linked Data that match the provided query.

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><strong>Query Parameters</strong></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"query","in":"query","description":"Autocomplete query","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"language","in":"query","description":"2-letter language code, e.g. 'en'.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"scope","in":"query","description":"Scope","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","default":"cloud","enum":["cloud"]}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"limit","in":"query","description":"Maximum number of results. // File: api/sitemap-generator/wordlift-sitemap-generator-api.info

import ApiLogo from "@theme/ApiLogo";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Export from "@theme/ApiDemoPanel/Export";

<span className={"theme-doc-version-badge badge badge--secondary"}>Version: 1.0</span>

# WordLift Sitemap Generator API



Generate a sitemap from a GraphQL query to WordLift KG.

## Generate Sitemap



Generates a sitemap from a GraphQL query to WordLift KG. You must provide a valid GraphQL query as the request body.


<MimeTabs><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{"textAlign":"left"}}><strong>Request Body</strong><strong style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","color":"var(--openapi-required)"}}> required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"query"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"{ foodEstablishments { name: string(name: \"schema:name\") url: string(name: \"schema:url\") }}"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"operationName"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"Operations"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Successful response
